parameters.name: context
parameters.description: Scope under which the request is made; determines fields present in response.n                    n                    n                    n                        n                            Default: viewn                        n                    n                    n                        One of: view, embed, edit

parameters.name: exclude
parameters.description: Ensure result set excludes specific ids.n                    n                    n                    n                        n                            Default:

parameters.name: hide_empty
parameters.description: Whether to hide resources not assigned to any posts.

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: Limit result set to specific ids.n                    n                    n                    n                        n                            Default:

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Offset the result set by a specific number of items.

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: Order sort attribute ascending or descending.n                    n                    n                    n                        n                            Default: ascn                        n                    n                    n                        One of: asc, desc

parameters.name: orderby
parameters.description: Sort collection by resource attribute.n                    n                    n                    n                        n                            Default: namen                        n                    n                    n                        One of: id, include, name, slug, term_group, description, count

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Current page of the collection.n                    n                    n                    n                        n                            Default: 1

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: Maximum number of items to be returned in result set.n                    n                    n                    n                        n                            Default: 10

parameters.name: post
parameters.description: Limit result set to resources assigned to a specific post.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Limit results to those matching a string.

parameters.name: slug
parameters.description: Limit result set to resources with a specific slug.

parameters.name: force
parameters.description: Required to be true, as resource does not support trashing.
